i think there is no day2  it start day1 and then day 3

sempressa - there was no Day 2 720p CTV release ever done.  It doesn't exist.  The only Day 2 rip that was done thus far was London.2012.Swimming.Day2.Finals.720p.HDTV.x264-OLYMPIANS which is a British feed I think.  And the mSD 480p release of Day2 is just a re-encode of the previous mentioned one.  I watched it, it's a perfect rip, just has British announcers.  I've watched swimming from the USA, CAN, and UK feeds and they all do a good job.  Of course the Country who's feed it is will boast & chat more about the athletes from their Country, but they all give good proper respect to all contestants in the swimming.  Hope this helps.  =)
